component_3_scenario_simulator.name: Multi-Path Future Explorer
component_3_scenario_simulator.description: Explore different future scenarios based on different decisions today

best_case.name: EXPLOSIVE GROWTH
assumptions: Philosopher AI goes viral (10K users in 3 months)
Nuclear consulting lands 5 contracts first year
Truth Coin launches successfully, crypto bull market

realistic_case.name: STEADY BUILDING
assumptions: Philosopher AI grows steadily (1K users in 6 months)
Enterprise sales take 6-12 months to close
Nuclear consulting lands 1-2 contracts first year
Truth Coin launches but takes time to gain traction
Normal startup challenges (some delays, some pivots)

worst_case.name: SLOW GRIND
assumptions: Philosopher AI struggles to find product-market fit
Enterprise sales very slow (12-18 month cycles)
Truth Coin launch delayed or fails
worst_case.note: Even worst case is SUCCESSFUL - $10M ARR with consciousness impact

pivot_scenarios.nuclear_first: Focus nuclear consulting, use profits to fund consciousness tech (low risk)
pivot_scenarios.crypto_boom: Truth Coin explodes, becomes primary business (high risk/reward)
pivot_scenarios.enterprise_saas: Triple Business Interface dominates, B2B focus (predictable growth)
pivot_scenarios.consumer_viral: Philosopher AI goes viral, consumer subscription model (fast growth)
